effects.description: After stealing 20 times, the next steal will add a Coal Bucket instead, which inflicts the burning condition to the player for 1.

effects.name: Unlucky Thief's Gloves
effects.description:
Sleight of Hand +2
Adds a piece of Charcoal to the wearer's inventory for each item they steal.
After stealing 20 times, the next steal will add a Coal Bucket instead, which inflicts the burning condition to the player for 1.

5.name: Unwanted Masterwork Gauntlets
5.description: Unwanted Masterwork Gauntlets are a rare pair of Gloves that provides a bonus to Attack Rolls and Strength Saving Throws. It is part of the Unwanted set.
5.quote: These gauntlets spark with unfinished, yet still potent, devilish magic - indicative of a cancelled blacksmith's commission.

5.name: Winkling Gloves
5.description: Winkling Gloves are a rare pair of Gloves that improves your Attack Rolls and Sleight of Hand checks.
5.quote: Good for a winkle in cases of mechanisms, locks, or some bugger who needs killing.

5.name: Winter's Clutches
5.description: The Winter's Clutches are an uncommon pair of Gloves that allow the wearer to inflict Encrusted with Frost on enemies whenever they deal Cold|Cold damage.
5.quote: Likely these originated in Icewind Dale, where tempers run as hot as hearths, and frozen rivers trace the arm of the dale in a network of blue-white tributaries.

5.name: Wondrous Gloves
5.description: The Wondrous Gloves are a rare pair of gloves that increase AC and give Bards an additional Bardic Inspiration.
5.quote: A series of motivational quotes have been enthusiastically removed from the embroidery of these gloves, as if in protest.

6.name: Adamantine Splint Armour
6.description: Adamantine Splint Armour is a very rare Heavy Armour that reduces all incoming damage by 2 and sends attackers Reeling. In addition, attacks can't land critical hits on the wearer.
6.quote: The adamantine plates lock and slide together perfectly - offering protection against even the deadliest of blades.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

effects.name: Adamantine Splint Armour
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

6.name: Armour of Devotion
6.description: Armour of Devotion is a set of rare Full Plate Heavy Armour that allows the wearer to cast Eternal Devotion, restoring a charge of their Paladin Channel Oath ability.
6.quote: The soft hum of a fervent prayer reverberates throughout the armoured plates.

effects.name: Eternal Devotion
effects.description: Recite your Oath to regain 1 Paladin chaoat (Long Rest).

6.name: Armour of Persistence
6.description: Armour of Persistence is a very rare Armour that grants its wearer permanent Resistance and Blade Ward effects in addition to reducing all damage taken by 2.
6.quote: Great sheets of steel were hammered and bashed into something like a carapace, thick and dense - you can almost feel the hammer blows, flooded with rich magic.

6.name: Blackguard's Plate
6.description: Blackguard's Plate is a very rare Heavy Armour that reduces all incoming damage by 1 and grants Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws.
6.quote: To break one's oath is a dangerous game - it marks you as a faithless cur, an exile without a cause. The armour is tempered by an age of rocks, blades, and persecution turned against it - and is buffed by the immutable, unbindable will of its wearer.

6.name: Cerebral Citadel Armour
6.description: Cerebral Citadel Armour is a rare Heavy Armour that makes the wearer immune to being Frightened and gives a +1 bonus to all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws if the wearer is infested by a mind flayer tadpole.
6.quote: The little tentacle engravings are a nice touch.

6.name: Chain Mail
6.description: Chain Mail is a common Heavy Armour.
6.quote: The tight weave of chains in this armour chimes like wind through leaves.

6.name: Chain Mail +1
6.description: Chain Mail +1 is an uncommon Heavy Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage.
6.quote: Fine fabric obscures the bulk of this chain mail, allowing its wearer to mix in polite society while protecting them from unexpected assailants.

6.name: Chain Mail +2
6.description: Chain Mail +2 is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage by 2.
6.quote: Made from thick, strong chains loosely-fitted, this armour hangs more heavily than some but protects its wearer with an impenetrable weave of metal.

6.name: Dwarven Splintmail
6.description: Dwarven Splintmail is a rare heavy armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage by 1 and grants a +1 bonus to Strength Saving Throws and Ability Checks. In addition, it also boosts the user's Constitution by 2.
6.quote: Skilled hands crafted this armour, reinforcing the metal plates while sacrificing none of the flexibility.

6.name: Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal
6.image: Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal Icon.png
6.icon: Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal Unfaded Icon.png
6.description: Emblazoned Plate of the Marshal is a very rare Heavy Armour that reduces all damage by 2, grants Fire Resistance, and the ability to cast Fire Shield.
6.quote: The tabard adoring this perfectly-kept platemail denotes the status of its wearer - Marshal of the Flaming Fist and ultimate military authority in Baldur's Gate.

6.name: Flawed Helldusk Armour
6.description: Flawed Helldusk Armour is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage by 1 and possibly deals Fire|1d4 Fire damage to attackers.
6.quote: 'I learned so much from Carixim. All sorts of forgecraft that... S-sorry. Just when I think of him, and the whimpers those people inside him made... I don't know. Anyway, it was worth it. Worth it to be the best.' - Overheard from the smith Dammon

6.name: Helldusk Armour
6.description: Helldusk Armour is a legendary heavy Armour that can be worn even without any proficiency. It also grants Fire resistance and reduces damage by 3 from all sources. Lastly, it also grants the Fly spell.
6.quote: Carixim, soul-stuffed forgemaster of hellish Avernus, hammers away ceaselessly at new creations. Questions of morality and destiny do not concern him. Conscience is for his betters. He works with cheer, his swollen skin moaning soothingly.

6.name: Plate Armour
6.description: Plate Armour is a common Heavy Armour.

6.name: Plate Armour +1
6.description: Plate Armour +1 is an uncommon Heavy Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage.

6.name: Plate Armour +2
6.description: Plate Armour +2 is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces damage from Piercing|Piercing, Bludgeoning|Bludgeoning and Slashing|Slashing sources by 2.

6.name: Protective Plate
6.description: Protective Plate is a set of Heavy Armour that grants Resistance to Necrotic|Necrotic damage.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Does not give disadvantage on stealth checks.

effects.name: Protective Plate
effects.description:
Grants Resistance to Necrotic damage
Does not give disadvantage on stealth checks.

6.name: Reaper's Embrace
6.description: Reaper's Embrace is a very rare heavy Armour that reduces incoming damage by 2 and makes the wearer immune to being moved by force. It also grants the Howl of the Dead class action.
6.quote: Heavy steel bones and teeth enclose the armour's chest and neck like a grotesque exoskeleton that both swallows and protects the wearer.

effects.name: Howl of the Dead
effects.description: Let out a bone-chilling howl that Numbs all nearby creatures.

6.name: Ring Mail Armour
6.description: Ring Mail Armour is a common Heavy Armour.

6.name: Ring Mail Armour +1
6.icon: Ring Mail Armour PlusOne Unfaded Icon.png
6.description: Ring Mail Armour +1 is a uncommon Heavy Armour that grants a +1 bonus to Strength Saving Throws and Ability Checks.

6.name: Ring Mail Armour +2
6.icon: Ring Mail Armour PlusTwo Unfaded Icon.png
6.description: Ring Mail Armour +2 is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage by 1 and grants a +1 bonus to Strength Saving Throws and Ability Checks.

6.name: Rippling Force Mail
6.description: Rippling Force Mail is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces physical damage taken and causes its wearer to deal force damage around them after being struck with physical attacks enough times.
6.quote: Dents, notches, and nicks add character to each ring of this mail - yet each blemish also speaks to those who tasted magical vengeance on the armour's behalf.

6.name: Splint Armour
6.description: Splint Armour is a common Heavy Armour.
6.quote: Combining sturdy metal plates with flexible cloth, this armour promises protection and mobility.

6.name: Splint Armour +1
6.description: Splint Armour +1 is a uncommon Heavy Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage by 1.
6.quote: Skilled hands crafted this armour, reinforcing the metal plates while sacrificing none of the flexibility.

6.name: Splint Armour +2
6.description: Splint Armour +2 is a rare Heavy Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage by 1 and grants a +1 bonus to Strength Saving Throws and Ability Checks.
6.quote: Wrought of an artisan's skill and passion, this armour will turn aside all but the fiercest of blades.

7.name: Assassin of Bhaal Cowl
7.icon: Assassin of Bhaal Cowl Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Assassin of Bhaal Cowl is a very rare Helmet that grants a bonus to Initiative and allows the wearer to see in the dark and cast See Invisibility.
7.quote: When he was killed, Bhaal's blight upon the world was not destroyed. For the many people upon whom he had sired his spawn slithered out of tainted wombs, and with their arrival Bhaal's malcontent returned with force.

7.name: Birthright
7.description: Birthright is a very rare Headwear that gives the wearer Charisma +2, up to a maximum of 22.
7.quote: 'The thing that you poor sods simply cannot grasp is how effortless all this magical hootie-wootie castie-spellsie business is for me!’ - A very stupid sorcerer at a wizard academy ball.

7.name: Bonespike Helmet
7.description: Bonespike Helmet is a very rare Helmet that when the wearer Rages, all hostile creatures within a 3m radius must roll a wisdom saving throw, if they do not succeed this roll then they take Psychic|2d4 Psychic damage. They receive half damage upon a successful roll.
7.quote: The tibia of a storm giant was ground and chiselled and reworked till it became this helm. The wearer can actually smell summer tempest clouds like maroon-dark dread while wearing the helm.

effects.name: Menacing Attack
effects.description: Usable once per turn. This ability does not consume Superiority Dice.

7.name: Browbeaten Circlet
7.description: Browbeaten Circlet is an uncommon piece of Headwear that grants the wearer a bonus to spell save DC while being threatened.
7.quote: A cornered animal will, on occasion, feel a rush of exhilarating energy, and an urge to fight. The same is true of many arcane practitioners, who do not take kindly to being menaced.

7.name: Cap of Curing
7.description: The Cap of Curing is an uncommon Hat that heals those inspired by the wearer using Bardic Inspiration.
7.quote: Putting on this hat is somehow enough to lift your spirits.

7.name: Cap of Wrath
7.description: The Cap of Wrath is a rare Helmet that grants the wearer Wrath when they start the turn with 50% Hit Points or less.
7.quote: With every blow the skullcap seems to compress, narrowing the vision of the wearer.

7.name: Circle of Bones
7.description: Circle of Bones is a rare Circlet that grants all nearby allied undead Resistance to physical damage, and the wearer can cast Animate Dead once per Long Rest.
7.quote: A coldness clings to this macabre circlet, like the chill of a grave.

7.name: Circlet of Blasting
7.description: The Circlet of Blasting is a rare circlet that grants the wearer the ability to cast the Scorching Ray spell.
7.quote: This delicate circlet grants the wearer the ability to cast the Scorching Ray spell.

7.name: Circlet of Hunting
7.description: The Circlet of Hunting is a very rare circlet that grants a +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls against marked creatures.
7.quote: Huntresses prowling in the least hospitable woods of Toril hold one rule as cardinal: kill quickly. This is not about suffering. It's about sound, and its necessary absence.

7.name: Circlet of Mental Anguish
7.icon: Circlet of Mental Anguish Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Circlet of Mental Anguish is a rare Circlet that heals the wearer for Healing|1d4 hit points when an enemy fails a Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom Saving Throw against one of the wearer's spells or cantrips.
7.quote: Fell magic has seeped into this circlet, rejoicing at the slightest touch of despair.

7.name: Circlet of Psionic Revenge
7.icon: Circlet of Psionic Revenge Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Circlet of Psionic Revenge is a rare Circlet that allows Gith to enhance their saving throws and punish casters with psychic damage.
7.quote: You get the eerie feeling that the jewelsmith used more than alien metals to forge this circlet - something like ancient magic, or shards of a soul.

7.name: Coldbrim Hat
7.description: Coldbrim Hat is an uncommon Hat that, once per turn, causes a condition the wearer inflicts with spells and cantrips to also inflict 2 turns of Encrusted with Frost.
7.quote: Upturning the hat and gazing into it, you get this slightly vertiginous feeling, as if you were looking into a cold, abandoned well with no discernible end.

7.name: Covert Cowl
7.description: Covert Cowl is an uncommon Helmet that makes the wearer's critical hits more likely when they are obscured.
7.quote: One of the relics of Deep Duerra's rebellious children. Keeping themselves and one another safe from the nasty surprises of their home, the siblings made good progress.  At the final hurdle, they were confronted by none other than Duerra herself, and her rage was great, and they felt the candles of hope in their hearts snuff out.

7.name: Dark Justiciar Helm
7.description: A Dark Justiciar Helm is an uncommon Helmet worn by Shar's Dark Justiciars that grants a bonus to Saving Throws while obscured by shadow.
7.quote: Stamped with Shar's own sigil, this helm was worn by the Nightsinger's own crusaders. The darkness within seems deeper than night, somehow.

7.name: Dark Justiciar Helmet
7.description: The Dark Justiciar Helmet is a very rare Helmet that improves the wearer's Saving Throws against Spells and makes Critical Hits more likely while the wearer is obscured by darkness.
7.quote: Adorned in a fanned coronet of speartip points, its mask fixed with stiff-lipped intent, this helmet evokes a frightful, almost alien aspect that gestures to Shar. For she is strange and terrible indeed.

7.name: Dark Justiciar Mask
7.description: Dark Justiciar Mask is an uncommon Helmet that grants the wearer a bonus to Intimidation checks.
7.quote: Worn by Shar's most loyal zealots, the mere sight of it strikes fear in the heart of even the bravest of souls.

7.name: Diadem of Arcane Synergy
7.icon: Diadem of Arcane Synergy Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Diadem of Arcane Synergy is a rare circlet that grants Arcane Synergy when the wearer inflicts a condition.
7.quote: This circlet shimmers with a hundred otherworldly metals.

7.name: Fistbreaker Helm
7.description: Fistbreaker Helm is an rare Helmet that grants a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and +1 to Initiative Rolls.
7.quote: 'If your foe rains down blows upon your head, turn not the other cheek, but let your pricking helm bleed the bastards dry.'

7.name: Flawed Helldusk Helmet
7.description: Flawed Helldusk Helmet is a rare Helmet crafted from Infernal Iron that improves the wearer's saving throws against spells by 2.
7.quote: 'When I found Carixim, he turned to me, all those poor people's souls crammed into him like too many bees in a rotten hive, and he... He grinned at me. And he said: I been expecting you, boy.' - Overheard from the smith Dammon

7.name: Gibus of the Worshipful Servant
7.image: Gibus of the Worshipful Servant Icon.png
7.icon: Gibus of the Worshipful Servant Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Gibus of the Worshipful Servant is a rare Headwear that grants Momentum equal to the wearer's Charisma Modifier at the start of combat and Advantage on Concentration Saving Throws.
7.quote: Corroded by Sceleritas' insouciant perversion, this little gibus hat was worn by the Butler before he sank throat-deep into Bhaal's clutches. Once, it was beyond besmirchment. Once, it was lovely.

7.name: Grymskull Helm
7.description: The Grymskull Helm is a very rare helmet that grants fire resistance and protects its wearer from critical hits. It also grants the Hunter's Mark spell.
7.quote: Once home to an inscrutable machine intelligence, Grym's skull now serves as a simple helm.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

effects.name: Grymskull Helm
effects.description:
Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.
Grants Resistance to Fire damage.
Hunter's Mark|level=1|recharge=Long Rest

7.name: Haste Helm
7.description: The Haste Helm is a rare helmet that grants the wearer a burst of speed at the start of combat.
7.quote: The helm throbs when violence is near, filling the wearer with a compulsion to act.

7.name: Hat of Fire Acuity
7.description: Hat of Fire Acuity is an uncommon hat that grants the wearer Arcane Acuity (Condition) whenever they deal Fire|Fire damage.
7.quote: It is said some wizard hats grant the power to keep your head cool - both literally and figuratively.

7.name: Hat of Storm Scion's Power
7.description: Hat of Storm Scion's Power is an uncommon hat that grants Arcane Acuity whenever the wearer deals Thunder|Thunder damage.
7.quote: Two sigils glow white where the hat brushes your temples - something is being tapped into; something distant and fearsome.

7.name: Hat of Uninhibited Kushigo
7.icon: Hat of Uninhibited Kushigo Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Hat of Uninhibited Kushigo is a rare hat that grants +1 bonus to their Spell Save DC after dealing damage with an unarmed attack.
7.quote: Coming upon a wise woman, Kushigo got drunk and grew maudlin, and told her about Irishi's scalping. She gave him some clothes - light and fine - and encouraged him to take his time to grieve. He did.And, when he was ready, he fought again, uninhibited by steel or fellowship - for they only weighed him down.

7.name: Hat of the Sharp Caster
7.image: Hat of the Sharp Caster Icon.png
7.icon: Hat of the Sharp Caster Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Hat of the Sharp Caster is a rare Helmet that rerolls the die(s) on spell attack rolls if they are a 1 or 2.
7.quote: All you need now is a holster for your wand, tobacco to chew, and some sort of pack animal to ride, and you'll look like a complete and utter bingus.

7.name: Helldusk Helmet
7.description: Helldusk Helmet is a very rare Helmet that grants the wearer the ability to see in magical darkness, and they cannot be blinded. They also gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against spells and can use Immolating Gaze to frighten enemies.
7.quote: It is said that Carixim, the fiending titan whose flesh squirms with twenty-thousand trapped souls, forged the pieces of this armour set.

effects.name: Immolating Gaze
effects.description: Sear and Frighten a target with nothing but your glower. You deal an additional 2d8|Fire damage against Burning creatures.

7.name: Helm of Balduran
7.description: Helm of Balduran is a legendary Headwear once worn by the fabled founder of Baldur's Gate, Balduran, and grants hit points every turn along with stun and critical hit immunities.
7.quote: This helm, worn atop the pate of Balduran the Brave, still gleams as if with the untarnished splendour of his legacy. Baldur's Gate itself bears his name, and tales of his exploits have turned the heads and hearts of many.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

effects.name: Helm of Balduran
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

7.name: Helmet of Arcane Acuity
7.icon: Helmet of Arcane Acuity Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Helmet of Arcane Acuity is an uncommon Helmet that causes the wearer to gain Arcane Acuity whenever they deal damage with a weapon attack.
7.quote: Subtle magics are woven into the helmet's leather panes - for a powerful offence is sometimes still the best defence.

7.name: Helmet of Autonomy
7.description: The Helmet of Autonomy is an uncommon Helmet that grants the wearer Proficiency in Wisdom Saving Throws.
7.quote: The metal bolted to the helmet's forehead is engraved with a faded script. Though the words have become unintelligible, their magic remains.

7.name: Helmet of Grit
7.description: The Helmet of Grit is a very rare Helmet that grants the wearer an additional Bonus Action at low Hit Points.
7.quote: At the barest touch, you feel a surge of exuberance and stamina - like you could take on anyone and anything.

7.name: Helmet of Smiting
7.description: The Helmet of Smiting is an uncommon Helmet that grants the wearer Temporary Hit Points whenever they apply a Condition using a Smite spell.
7.quote: A set of runes have been expertly worked into the helmet's filigree. Almost imperceptibly - but powerful nonetheless.

7.name: Holy Lance Helm
7.description: A Holy Lance Helm is an uncommon Helmet that potentially deals radiant damage to creatures that attack the wearer.
7.quote: Brief halos of divine light wrap your head when you don and doff this helmet.

7.name: Hood of the Weave
7.icon: Hood of the Weave Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Hood of the Weave is a very rare Helmet that boosts its wearer's Spell Save DC and Spell Attack rolls by 2.
7.quote: Worn by the wizard Tenser when he was inducted into the Circle of Eight.

7.name: Horns of the Berserker
7.icon: Horns of the Berserker Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Horns of the Berserker is a very rare Helmet that grants a +2 bonus to Attack Rolls and 2 Necrotic damage to melee hits against damaged creatures.
7.quote: This was created by a designer and an enchanter who were going through a messy divorce at the time. As such, the armour is filled with active-aggressive rage. It also makes you feel like you've wasted the last ten years picking up after a complete tit.

7.name: Jannath's Hat
7.description: Jannath's Hat is a very rare headwear that gives advantage to persuasion and deception checks.
7.quote: The corner of modern fashion that this hat currently occupies might well be called Optimistic.

effects.name: Jannath's Hat
effects.description:
Advantage on Persuasion Checks.
Advantage on Deception Checks.

7.name: Key of the Ancients
7.icon: Key of the Ancients Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Key of the Ancients is an uncommon Helmet that grants the wearer a bonus to Nature checks.
7.quote: The branches of this circlet are half-fossilised, passed down through generations of druids. Fabricated during the founding of the grove, the wreath is forever linked to its lands, the tiny rubies connected to its stones and structures, bidding them to do their bidding.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: While standing in front of the stone door in Nettie's room in the Druid Grove, you can open a shortcut to the Underground Passage.

effects.name: Key of the Ancients
effects.description:
Nature +1
While standing in front of the stone door in Nettie's room in the Druid Grove, you can open a shortcut to the Underground Passage.

7.name: Marksmanship Hat
7.description: Marksmanship Hat is an uncommon hat that grants its wearer a bonus to ranged and thrown attack rolls.
7.quote: Silvery wings spread over the stiff unyielding leather.

7.name: Mask of Soul Perception
7.icon: Mask of Soul Perception Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: Mask of Soul Perception is a very rare Helmet that increases a wearer's Attack Rolls, Initiative Rolls, and Perception Checks by 2. The wearer can also cast Detect Thoughts once per Short Rest.
7.quote: Formerly worn by Autumnal Baskin, a professional mediator turned bare-knuckle champion, who gained enlightenment via two methods. The first was giving up her addictive reliance on secluded caves and lonely mountaintops, and getting a bit more sociable. This involved many new skirts. Most of them lavender.

7.name: Mask of the Shapeshifter
7.icon: Mask of the Shapeshifter Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Mask of the Shapeshifter is a legendary Mask which lets the wearer cast Disguise Self at will.
7.quote: The magic of this mask comes from its gory provenance and makes it perfect for the discerning actor, sleuth or person with a mirror and time to kill.

effects.name: Disguise Self
effects.description: Can cast the Disguise Self spell at will.

7.name: Pyroquickness Hat
7.description: Pyroquickness Hat is a very rare Hat that burns the wearer when casting a Fire|Fire spell, but also grants them an extra Bonus Action.
7.quote: Merely holding the circlet makes your skin flush, filling you with determination and righteous fury.

7.name: Sarevok's Horned Helmet
7.description: Sarevok's Horned Helmet is a very rare Headwear that grants Darkvision to its wearer and increases critical hit chance. You also cannot be Frightened.
7.quote: The last sight Sarevok witnessed as a mortal was his sibling's knife. This duel, the first between Bhaalspawn, is worshipped still by the cult of Bhaal, who now believe that no act is more sacred than fratricide between spawn before the altar of their Dread Lord.

7.name: Scabby Pugilist Circlet
7.description: The Scabby Pugilist Circlet is a rare Helmet that grants additional damage on weapon and unarmed strikes while surrounded by 2 or more foes.
7.quote: Every adventuring party has at least one 'chaotic element'. In the case of one such party, this was the infamous Scabby, a barbarous goblin who was trained by monks.

7.name: Shadow of Menzoberranzan
7.description: The Shadow of Menzoberranzan is an rare Helmet that allows the wearer to use Shrouded in Shadow, to become Invisible.
7.quote: You sense the shadows that envelop this drowcraft cowl, eagerly awaiting to envelop you and shield you from view.

effects.name: Shrouded in Shadow
effects.description: Become Invisible for 2 turns. The spell breaks if you attack, cast another spell, perform an action, or take damage.

7.name: Shapeshifter Hat
7.description: Shapeshifter Hat is a very rare Headwear that grants the wearer one more Wild Shape charge per Long Rest.
7.quote: 'Trust is the most fundamental part of wild-shaping. Not trusting others, but trusting yourself. Because the assumption of an animalistic form comes part and parcel with risk - that you'll like being a beast. Like it too much. You've got to trust yourself to the extent that you're comfortable courting that danger. Trust yourself the way you trust a marital partner with your heart.' - Mac Tire, Moon Druid

7.name: Steelwatcher Helmet
7.description: Steelwatcher Helmet is a rare Helmet that grants the wearer the wearer Darkvision and immunity to Blindness. It also grants Advantage on Constitution Saving Throws.
7.quote: 'When I found Carixim, he turned to me, all those poor people's souls crammed into him like too many bees in a rotten hive, and he... He grinned at me. And he said: I been expecting you, boy.' - Overheard from the smith Dammon

7.name: The Lifebringer
7.description: The Lifebringer is an uncommon circlet that grants the wearer temporary hit points whenever they gain Lightning Charges.
7.quote: 'Lightning is like magic,' Yrre the Sparkstruck once said. 'And what is magic but life itself?'

7.name: The Pointy Hat
7.description: The Pointy Hat is a rare hat that gives the wearer a bonus to their persuasion checks equal to their Intelligence modifier.
7.quote: Sages over the course of ages have dealt very constructive and useful advice - however, none so sagacious as that of the wizard Otiluke, who once advised one of his students thusly: 'Never cast Speak with Dead on a loved one if there's unresolved tension there. It's never worth it. Trust me.'

7.name: The Shadespell Circlet
7.description: The Shadespell Circlet is an uncommon Helmet that grants a bonus Spell Save DC when the wearer is obscured in shadow.
7.quote: One of the relics of Deep Duerra's rebellious children. Flanked by her court, Duerra shook her head at her children. Had they really believed they could leave her?

7.name: Wapira's Crown
7.description: Wapira's Crown is an uncommon Helmet that heals the wearer whenever they heal another creature.
7.quote: Legends say a Giant Elk and a druid once formed a powerful friendship. When the Elk laid down his life for the druid, she crafted this helmet in honour of her beloved friend, so his beauty and compassion would live on forever.

7.name: Warped Headband of Intellect
7.icon: Warped Headband of Intellect Unfaded Icon.png
7.description: The Warped Headband of Intellect is an uncommon Circlet that raises the wearer's Intelligence to 17.
7.quote: This particular circlet is covered in yellow slime and has pieces of half-digested mutton stuck behind the gems.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Set the wearer's Intelligence score to 17. The enchantment has no effect if their Intelligence score is higher without it.

effects.name: Warped Headband of Intellect
effects.description: Set the wearer's Intelligence score to 17. The enchantment has no effect if their Intelligence score is higher without it.

8.name: Armour of Landfall
8.description: Armour of Landfall is a very rare Light Armour that improves the spellcasting ability of its wearer and advantage on Constitution Saving Throws. The wearer also heals while standing in vines and can cast Plant Growth.
8.quote: Smelling of long-abandoned gardens grown wild with thorny roses, moss and hibiscus, this armour was worn by a powerful druid who spent so long from people that she forgot to miss them.

effects.name: Armour of Landfall
effects.description:
Advantage on Constitution SavingThrows.
Plant Growth|level=3|recharge=Short Rest

8.name: Armour of Moonbasking
8.description: Armour of Moonbasking is a very rare Light Armour bought from Voiceless Penitent Bareki that bestows Temporary Hit Points and Armour Class to its wielder when they Wild Shape.
8.quote: This armour was designed by lunar-obsessed Cuthbertina, a gnomish arcane smith who now lives peacefully on a mountain plateau with her magical forge.

8.name: Armour of the Sporekeeper
8.description: Armour of the Sporekeeper is a very rare Light Armour that enhances the wearer's Necrotic|Necrotic damage and Symbiotic Entity ability with 3 new abilities.
8.quote: According to one story, this armour was enriched by the cascading spores of a myconid sovereign, its great fungal head shimmering and twinkling as it shook upon the material.

8.name: Bandit's Armour
8.description: Bandit's Armour is a common Light Armour. It is not normally obtainable in most circumstances
8.quote: This lightweight armour appears to have been quickly produced, skipped stitches and fraying edges betraying the inattention of its maker.

8.name: Bhaalist Armour
8.description: Bhaalist Armour is a very rare Light Armour that grants an Aura of Murder and a bonus to Initiative rolls.
8.quote: Bhaal, Lord of Murder, was forced to walk the world as a mortal man during a period of history called the Time of Troubles. He was more vulnerable than he had ever been. But Bhaal was cunning. He had contingencies in case he died.

8.name: Blazer of Benevolence
8.description: The Blazer of Benevolence is an uncommon Light Armour that grants the wearer Temporary Hit Points when they inspire an ally with Bardic Inspiration.
8.quote: Even though the embroidered velvet won't help against a sharp blade, wearing it fills you with self-assuredness.

8.name: Broken Padded Armour
8.description: Broken Padded Armour is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: A standard gambeson of quilted cloth. Good for catching blows, but almost unbearably sweaty.

8.name: Druid Leather Armour
8.description: Druid Leather Armour is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: Dark, messy stains line the armholes of the well-used leather breastplate.

8.name: Elegant Studded Leather
8.description: Elegant Studded Leather is a very rare Light Armour that provides bonuses to initiative, Advantage on Stealth checks, and grants access to the Shield spell.
8.quote: After she returned from her confinement at the hands of the demon prince Graz'zt, the Goddess of prosperity, Waukeen, appointed a champion, who donned this studded leather and took up arms against those who had schismed and corrupted her church in the interim.

effects.name: Elegant Studded Leather
effects.description:
Advantage on Stealth checks.
Shield|level=1|recharge=Short Rest

8.name: Faded Drow Leather Armour
8.image: Faded Drow Studded Leather Armour Icon.png
8.icon: Faded Drow Studded Leather Armour Unfaded Icon.png
8.description: Faded Drow Leather Armour is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: The sun's harsh light has dulled this armour's dark lustre.

8.name: Leather Armour
8.description: Leather Armour is a common Light Armour. It is the starter Armour for Rangers.
8.quote: Dark, messy stains line the armholes of the well-used leather breastplate.

8.name: Leather Armour +1
8.description: Leather Armour +1 is an uncommon Light Armour that grants a +1 bonus to Stealth checks.
8.quote: This well-tailored leather tunic is reinforced by geometric quilting.

8.name: Leather Armour +2
8.description: Leather Armour +2 is an uncommon Light Armour that grants a +1 bonus to Stealth checks as well as Dexterity Saving Throws and Ability Checks.
8.quote: This armour is stitched together with thick, metal-lined cord, reinforcing it at the seams.

8.name: Padded Armour
8.description: Padded Armour is a common Light Armour. It is the starter armour for Warlocks.
8.quote: A standard gambeson of quilted cloth. Good for catching blows, but almost unbearably sweaty.

8.name: Padded Armour +1
8.icon: Padded Armour PlusOne B Unfaded Icon.png
8.description: Padded Armour +1 is a uncommon Light Armour.
8.quote: The quilting threads running through this padded vest seem to gleam in the rising sun.

8.name: Penumbral Armour
8.description: Penumbral Armour is a rare Light Armour that enhances Stealth when the wearer is Obscured.
8.quote: One of the Relics of Deep Duerra's rebellious children. Kitted out though they were for escape, the older siblings had a horrible time encouraging their younger brothers and sisters, who at the crux were frightened of what their mother would do to them should they be caught.

8.name: Scarlet Leather Armour
8.description: Scarlet Leather Armour is an uncommon Light Armour that grants its wearer +1 to Stealth checks.
8.quote: This well-tailored leather tunic is reinforced by geometric quilting.

8.name: Selûnite Robe
8.description: Selunite Robe is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: Crafted with care, this robe will protect you from the elements. It won't do much against a sword's thrust, though.

8.name: Shadeclinger Armour
8.description: Shadeclinger Armour is a rare Light Armour that grants Advantage on Saving Throws while Obscured.
8.quote: Glutted with lone wolves and well-meaning scallywags, the Harpers are not averse to shadows - quite the contrary. For many such individuals, being swallow in the dark throat of the night is the only method they know or care to know.

8.name: Simple Jerkin
8.description: Simple Jerkin is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: Dark, messy stains line the armholes of the well-used leather breastplate.

8.name: Spidersilk Armour
8.description: Spidersilk Armour is a rare Light Armour that aids the wearer with Stealth checks and Constitution Saving Throws.
8.quote: Tracings of glossy black spider-web mark this drow-made armour. It is supple, but strong - and made to blend in with the dark caves and crevices of the Underdark.

8.name: Studded Leather Armour
8.description: Studded Leather Armour is a common Light Armour.
8.quote: Shaped, hardened, and reinforced with metal studs, leather is the armour of choice for those who value agility as much as protection.

8.name: Studded Leather Armour +1
8.description: Studded Leather Armour +1 is an uncommon Light Armour that reduces Bludgeoning|Bludgeoning damage by 1.
8.quote: This armour is strong enough to stop a dagger and light enough to escape whatever weapon follows it.

8.name: Studded Leather Armour +2
8.icon: Studded Leather Armour PlusTwo Unfadded Icon.png
8.description: Studded Leather Armour +2 is a rare Light Armour that reduces Bludgeoning|Bludgeoning damage by 1 and also boosts Initiative by 1.
8.quote: Superbly shaped, elegantly designed, and tough as ring mail with none of the weight.

9.name: +1 Breastplate
9.description: +1 Breastplate is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Wearing this "plus one" garment allows you to bring one additional person to a wedding or any other similar occasion.

9.name: Adamantine Scale Mail
9.description: Adamantine Scale Mail is a very rare Medium Armour that reduces all damage by 1 and sends attackers Reeling. In addition, attacks cannot land Critical Hits on the user.
9.quote: The adamantine scales hug your body like a second skin - a heavy, near-impregnable skin.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

effects.name: Adamantine Scale Mail
effects.description: Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

9.name: Armour of Agility
9.description: The Armour of Agility is a very rare Medium Armour that doesn't limit your AC's Dexterity bonus, and boosts all of the user's Saving Throws by 2.
9.quote: Layered sheets of smelted, shaped, and smithed steel have been etched with a sweetly luminous gold. Its outward appearance is heavy. And yet it's so light when you lift it, like lifting a bag of shrunken dead leaves.

9.name: Barkskin Armour
9.description: Barkskin Armour is a rare Medium Armour that sets the user's Armour Class to 16 and grants Advantage on Constitution Saving Throws.
9.quote: The bark motifs in this armour are like the boles of oak trees in a wood where the acorns slept long and grew proud.

9.name: Breastplate
9.description: Breastplate is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: This standard-sized breastplate is lined with thick padding meant to cushion the wearer and deflect blows from assailants. The uniform squares of the padding suggest a mathematically-mind crafter.

9.name: Breastplate +1
9.description: Breastplate +1 is an uncommon Medium Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage.
9.quote: This breastplate is crafted in the specialty style of a mysterious armourer in Amn known only as 'The Tailor.'

9.name: Breastplate +2
9.description: Breastplate +2 is a rare Medium Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage and grants a +1 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws and Ability Checks.
9.quote: This garment's previous owner left a few minor personal effects in its inner breast pocket: a scrap of sassafrass, a short bit of thread, and half a peppermint.

9.name: Chain Shirt
9.description: A Chain Shirt is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Tight chains protect the wearer from many sharp weapons, while fabric padding protects the skin from cold metal.

9.name: Chain Shirt +1
9.description: Chain Shirt +1 is an uncommon Medium Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage.
9.quote: The intricate embroidery on the linen panel of this armour indicates the nobility of its previous owner.

9.name: Chain Shirt +2
9.description: Chain Shirt +2 is a rare Medium Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage and grants a +1 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws and Ability Checks
9.quote: This mail's impossibly fine, close joining indicates the work of gnomish fingers.

9.name: Damaged Dark Justiciar Armour
9.description: A Medium Armour that is the degraded version of Dark Justiciar Mail. It is part of the Dark Justiciar Set.
9.quote: Though time has tarnished this armour's metal and cracked its leather, the black sheen of Shar's symbol shines eternal from its chestpiece.

9.name: Damaged Scale Mail
9.description: Damaged Scale Mail is a common Medium armour offering less protection than other Medium armours due to its damaged state.
9.quote: With many broken and missing scales, the armour offers little in the way of protection.

9.name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Rare)
9.description: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate is a rare Medium Armour that grants Advantage on Stealth checks while Obscured in shadow. It also grants Advantage on Constitution Saving Throws and allows its wearer to cast Shield of Faith once per Long Rest.
9.quote: Shar's aspect winds its way though the patterns and pauldrons of this half plate, and any light cast nearby seems to almost quiver away from it, afraid. For even the light knows that the clank of this armour is swiftly followed by the Dark Justiciar's silent blade.

9.name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Very Rare)
9.description: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate is a very rare Medium Armour that grants Advantage on Stealth checks while Obscured in shadow. It also grants Advantage on Constitution Saving Throws, allows its wearer to cast Shield of Faith once per Long Rest, and reduces damage while Shield of Faith is active on its wearer.
9.quote: Shar's aspect winds its way though the patterns and pauldrons of this half plate, and any light cast nearby seems to almost quiver away from it, afraid. For even the light knows that the clank of this armour is swiftly followed by the Dark Justiciar's silent blade.

effects.name: Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (Very Rare)
effects.description:
Advantage on Constitution SavingThrows.
Shar's Aegis|level=1|recharge=Long Rest

9.name: Dark Justiciar Mail
9.description: Dark Justiciar Mail is an uncommon Medium Armour that deals Necrotic damage to creatures that hit the wearer with a melee attack while the wearer is Obscured by shadow.
9.quote: Though well-preserved, the armour's gleam is somewhat muted - as if half-shadowed, even in brightest day.

9.name: Dreamwalker Plate
9.description: Dreamwalker Plate is a set of Medium Armour worn by the guardian who appears in your dreams.
9.quote: A battle-burnished armour tempered with otherworldly steel.

9.name: Elven Chain
9.description: Elven Chain is a rare Medium Armour that grants its wearer bonuses to Initiative Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws.
9.quote: The weight of the interwoven steel rings is offset by clever elven craftsmanship - rustling against your undershirt, the mail feels like you're wearing a cloud.

9.name: Flame Enamelled Armour
9.description: Flame Enamelled Armour is a very rare Medium Armour that grants a +2 bonus to Initiative and grants Resistance to Fire|Fire damage and +2 to all Saving Throws. It also allows the user to cast the Fire Shield: Warm spell.
9.quote: The air around this armour shimmers, oven-hot. From the seams of the armour you can hear a red-tinted rumble, like coals digesting in a furnace.

9.name: Half Plate Armour
9.description: Half Plate Armour is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: This heavy, resilient breastplate is reinforced by a padded gamberson to protect soldiers from hip to neck.

9.name: Half Plate Armour +1
9.description: Half Plate Armour +1 is a uncommon Medium Armour that reduces Piercing|Piercing damage.
9.quote: Heraldic runes are sewn into the padding of this armour, offering a gift of protection to whoever dons it.

9.name: Half Plate Armour +2
9.icon: Half Plate Armour PlusTwo Unfaded Icon.png
9.description: Half Plate Armour +2 is a rare Medium Armour that moderately reduces Slashing|Slashing damage.
9.quote: This breastplate is far tougher than it appears, taking blows from common weapons without suffering so much as a scratch.

9.name: Hedge Wanderer Armour
9.description: The Hedge Wanderer Armour is an uncommon Medium Armour that provides a small boost to Dexterity related rolls and towards Nature Skill Checks.
9.quote: This simple cured goat hide was enchanted by a travelling druid. A goatherd once helped her negotiate a strange maze of hedges, so she blessed all his goats in thanks.

9.name: Hide Armour
9.description: Hide Armour is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Constructed from carefully-chosen animal hides tanned, hardened and varnished to a gleaming finish.

9.name: Hide Armour +1
9.description: Hide Armour +1 is a uncommon Medium Armour.
9.quote: Tight stitches bind panels of hard leather into a formfitting carapace that moves like a second skin.

9.name: Hide Armour +2
9.description: Hide Armour +2 is a rare Medium Armour that grants a +1 bonus to Dexterity Saving Throws and Ability Checks, as well as Initiative.
9.quote: This hide armour, soft to the touch but hard as a zaratan's hide, is stitched together of narrow panels allowing for the wearer's ease of movement and comfort.

9.name: Luminous Armour
9.description: Luminous Armour is an uncommon Medium Armour that allows the wearer to cause radiant shockwaves whenever they deal Radiant|Radiant damage.
9.quote: Many an adventurer has found themselves swallowed up by the dark throat of some nameless dungeon, aching for a glimpse of light.

9.name: Psionic Ward Armour
9.description: Psionic Ward Armour is a set of rare Medium Armour that gives the wearer Resistance to Psychic|Psychic damage and heals them if they pass a Saving throws.
9.quote: After all that was done to them at the illithids' caprice, it is little wonder that the gith would construct armaments fit for combating the psionic might

9.name: Scale Mail +1
9.icon: Scale Mail B PlusOne Unfaded Icon.png
9.description: Scale Mail +1 is a uncommon Medium Armour that reduces Slashing|Slashing damage.
9.quote: The work of a skilled craftsman, this scale shirt offers better protection than most.

9.name: Scale Mail +2
9.description: Scale Mail +2 is a rare Medium Armour.
9.quote: Crafted by an artist's hands, this exquisite scale shirt feels like it could turn aside any blade.

9.name: Scale Mail of Devotion
9.icon: Scale Mail of Devotion Unfaded Icon.png
9.description: The Scale Mail of Devotion is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Embroidered on the tabard are the tenets of devotion: Honesty, Courage, Compassion, Honour, and Duty.

9.name: Scale Mail of Vengeance
9.icon: Scale Mail of Vengeance Unfaded Icon.png
9.description: The Scale Mail of Vengeance is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Gold embroidery covers the inside of the tabard, right over the heart: 'By any means necessary, I will fight the Greater Evil, showing no mercy for the wicked.'

9.name: Scale Mail of the Ancients
9.image: Scale Male of the Ancients Icon.png
9.icon: Scale Mail of the Ancients Unfaded Icon.png
9.description: The Scale Mail of the Ancients is a common Medium Armour.
9.quote: Four embroidered sentences decorate the tabard - the tenets of the ancients: 'Kindle the Light. Shelter the Light. Preserve your own Light. Be the Light.'

9.name: Sharpened Snare Cuirass
9.description: Sharpened Snare Cuirass is a very rare Medium Armour that adds your full Dexterity Modifier to your Armour Class. Enemies also have Disadvantage when resisting your attacks and Saving Throws that inflict Restrained.
9.quote: This magnificent hide was harvested from a rare mythological creature of the Feywild, a cross bettween a unicorn and a stoat.

9.name: Slippery Chain Shirt
9.description: The Slippery Chain Shirt is an uncommon Medium Armour that allows the wearer to move without provoking Opportunity Attacks after healing a creature.
9.quote: Scored with slime and blood, it seems this chain mail shirt couldn't save its previous owner. Although it may help the next.

9.name: The Jolty Vest
9.description: The Jolty Vest is a rare Medium Armour that shocks enemies who land attacks on the wearer while they have Lightning Charges.
9.quote: Yrre the Sparkstruck got their nickname for both their obsession with lightning and the inventions they created, which had the habit of electrocuting both Yrre and any poor observers that got too close.

9.name: The Oak Father's Embrace
9.description: The Oakfather's Embrace is an uncommon Medium Armour that deals Radiant|Radiant damage to creatures violating the natural order, including the wearer.
9.quote: Embroidered with a simple maxim - 'Nature is the True State of the World' - these hides radiate a faint divine power.

9.name: Unwanted Masterwork Scalemail
9.description: The Unwanted Masterwork Scalemail is a rare Medium Armour that doesn't limit your AC's Dexterity bonus. It is part of the Unwanted set.
9.quote: Nothing stings the master blacksmith more than a cancelled commission - not even molten iron. This mail is engraved with the mark of a devillish forgemaster, as well as several curses stamped out in infernal, and hums with diabolic magic.

9.name: Yuan-Ti Scale Mail
9.description: Yuan-Ti Scale Mail is a rare Medium Armour that adds the wearer's Dexterity Modifier to their Armour Class and also grants a +1 bonus to Initiative.
9.quote: The Snakefolk of Chult are not known for waste, so often forge lightweight and robust armour like this from their own shed skin.

10.name: After Death Do Us Part
10.icon: Partner Ring B Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: After Death Do Us Part is a rare Ring that allows its wearer to regain half their hit points after being Downed, but be cursed with Shadow Possession.
10.quote: Love is the last cruel leaf to fall in an autumn wide with sorrow.

10.name: Band of the Mystic Scoundrel
10.icon: Ring E Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Band of the Mystic Scoundrel is a rare Ring that grants the wearer the ability to cast illusion or enchantment spells as a bonus action after hitting a creature with a weapon attack.
10.quote: What better way to disguise one's transgressions than a quickly positioned phantasm after the deed is done?

10.name: Bracing Band
10.icon: Ring E Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Bracing Band is an uncommon Ring that makes the wearer more difficult to hit after they shove an enemy.
10.quote: A common ring, simple and unadorned. Though there is a certain heft to it...

10.name: Burnished Ring
10.image: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Burnished Ring is a very rare Ring that allows the wearer to cast Paralyzing Ray once per Long Rest.
10.quote: A paralysing eyestalk harvested from a beholder was boiled in a broth, and poured down the throat of a dwarven ringsmith. Not one fortnight thence, he crafted this ring.

10.name: Callous Glow Ring
10.icon: Ring E Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Callous Glow Ring is an uncommon Ring that causes the wearer to deal an additional Radiant|2 Radiant damage|drs to illuminated creatures every time they deal damage.
10.quote: A grudging gleam emits from this ring - more an indictment of light than an endorsement.

10.name: Caustic Band
10.icon: Ring F Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Caustic Band is an uncommon Ring that grants the wearer Acid|2 Acid damage with weapon attacks.
10.quote: Adjusting this unassuming ring on your finger, you hear a faint sizzle, as of pressure being released.

10.name: Coruscation Ring
10.icon: Ring A Simple Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Coruscation Ring is an uncommon ring that inflicts Radiating Orb on creatures that the wearer deals spell damage to. The wearer must be illuminated for this effect to occur.
10.quote: Provocative light blooms from the engraved contours of this ring.

10.name: Crusher's Ring
10.icon: Crushers Ring Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Crusher's Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants additional speed to the wearer.
10.quote: Though caked with mud and grime, the ring smells faintly of lavender. Remarkable, considering where it's been.

10.name: Crypt Lord Ring
10.icon: Ring I Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Crypt Lord Ring is a very rare Ring that allows the wearer to cast Create Undead once per Long Rest.
10.quote: Slipping one's finger through this ring fills the senses with the waft of tombs, the urine-yellow smell of old bandages, images of dead spiders curled into husks, and the sensation of hot, slobbering breath at the nape of one's neck.

10.name: Djinni Ring
10.icon: Ring D 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Djinni Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants its wearer the ability to cast Mage Hand.
10.quote: The ring from the djinni who worked in the circus. Its magic certainly explains how the djinni was able to cheat at the wheel.

10.name: Eversight Ring
10.icon: Ring I Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Eversight Ring is an uncommon Ring that gives the wearer Immunity to Blinded.
10.quote:
One of the relics of the Deep Duerra's rebellious children. Paranoid by nature, Duerra had erected a vast array of biting, blasting, blinding traps and safeguards to keep her enemies from gaining her sanctum. 

Of course, this also meant her children were sealed in with her by those same deadly measures.

10.name: Explorer's Ring
10.icon: Explorers Ring Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Explorer's Ring is an uncommon Ring that improves the wearer's knowledge of Nature and Survival.
10.quote: A radiant and remarkably preserved ring, forged from arandur metal.

10.name: Family Ring
10.image: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Family Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants Death SavingThrow +2.
10.quote: The ring's simplicity is a deceit. Its gold core is woven with iron-hard feathers from the wings of great black corvid birds, envoys of the Raven Queen.

10.name: Fetish of Callarduran Smoothhands
10.icon: Fetish of Callarduran Smoothhands Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Fetish of Callarduran Smoothhands is a rare Ring that allows the wearer to cast the Invisibility spell once per Long Rest.
10.quote: The smooth, six-pointed star on this ring is beset with small Underdark gemstones, as befits a talisman of the god of mining and patron of deep gnomes.

10.name: Firzu's Ring of Trading
10.icon: Ring I Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Firzu's Ring of Trading is an uncommon Ring that grants +1 to Deception.
10.quote: Belonged to a trader Firzu. Increases Deception Checks by 1.

10.name: Guiding Light
10.icon: Ring D Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Guiding Light is an uncommon Ring that allows the wearer to cast the Light cantrip.
10.quote: Used by the previous owner to access both the Underdark's darkest corners and her own basement, this ring seems to reflect light where there should be none.

10.name: Guild Ring
10.icon: Guild Ring Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Guild Ring is a story-rarity ring found in Act 3.
10.quote: Calishite emeralds are embedded in this heavy silver ring.

10.name: Keepsake Ring
10.image: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Keepsake Ring is a rare Ring that allows its wearer to cast Dominate Beast as a 5th level spell once per Long Rest.
10.quote: Created by a conglomerate of druids one moonlit night when all the stirring violins of insect, elms, and whispering winds consorted, and when wild beasts in need of taming prowled unseen.

10.name: Killer's Sweetheart
10.icon: Ring I Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Killer's Sweetheart is a very rare Ring that makes the wearer's next Attack Roll a critical hit after killing a creature, once per Long Rest.
10.quote: Though the ring is highly polished, darkened slivers of blood still cling to small scrapes and corners.

10.name: Mage's Friend
10.icon: Ring C Silver A Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Mage's Friend is an uncommon Ring that improves the wearer's knowledge of Arcana and Religion.
10.quote: Though carefully stowed away in a bedside chest, this ring is covered in dust and cobwebs.

10.name: Orphic Ring
10.image: Ring B Gem B Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring B Gem B Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Orphic Ring is a very rare ring that grants its wearer the Confusion (level 5) spell on a long rest cooldown.
10.quote: When light catches this ring at the right angle, it pulses with a dizzying, intoxicating glow befitting the jewellery of the Prince of the Comet.

10.name: Poisoner's Ring
10.icon: Ring G Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Poisoner's Ring is an uncommon Ring that allows the wearer to cast Virulent Venom.
10.quote: Strange, green fumes seep from the ring's emerald.

effects.name: Virulent Venom
effects.description: Point your ringed finger at a target to make it vulnerable to Poison damage, unless it is immune to Poison damage. (Long Rest)

10.name: Ring of Absolute Force
10.icon: Ring of Absolute Force Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Absolute Force is an uncommon Ring that allows the wearer to cast the Thunderwave spell and deal 1 additional thunder damage if they have the Absolute's Brand.
10.quote: Darkness seems to blossom from this ring, heightened by the menacing glare of the Absolute's symbol, though for the Branded this symbol holds the promise of power.

10.name: Ring of Arcane Synergy
10.icon: Ring B Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Arcane Synergy is a rare Ring that grants Arcane Synergy when the wearer deals damage with a cantrip.
10.quote: The sharp silver corners of this ring almost cut into the stone set in its centre - a gem of which you've never seen the like before.

10.name: Ring of Blink
10.image: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Blink is a rare Ring that allows the wearer to cast Blink once per Long Rest.
10.quote: Fashioned by the wizard Bigby in honour of his faithful hound Bigboy, who could use teleportation to fetch, snare errant cats, and generally harass postmen.

10.name: Ring of Colour Spray
10.icon: Ring D Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Colour Spray is an uncommon Ring that allows the wearer to cast the Colour Spray spell once per short rest.
10.quote: When the light hits it just so, the centre jewel shimmers with every colour of the rainbow.

effects.name: Colour Spray
effects.description: Cast as a level 1 spell (Short Rest).

10.name: Ring of Elemental Infusion
10.icon: Ring H Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Elemental Infusion is an uncommon Ring that infuses your weapon with the element of your spells or cantrips, dealing additional damage.
10.quote: The mysterious gem set in this ring seems to change hues whenever you aren't looking.

10.name: Ring of Evasion
10.icon: Ring of Evasion Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Evasion is a very rare Ring that grants the wearer Dextrous Evasion.
10.quote: Decorated with a hummingbird wrought of jade and sapphire, this ring evokes the sheer wonderful quickness of that animal.

10.name: Ring of Exalted Marrow
10.icon: Ring of Exalted Marrow Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Exalted Marrow is a rare Ring that grants the wearer the ability to cast Exhort the Risen and Ghoulish Touch.
10.quote: Gazing through this ring, you find that there is no other side, only a small sucking blackness that defies explanation.

effects.name: Ring of Exalted Marrow
effects.description:
Exhort the Risen|level=1|recharge=Long Rest
Ghoulish Touch|level=1|recharge=Long Rest

10.name: Ring of Feywild Sparks
10.icon: Ring H Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Feywild Sparks is a very rare Ring that forces Wild Magic Surges to always trigger while Tides of Chaos feature is active.
10.quote: This otherwise unassuming ring ties a spellcaster indelibly to the sporadic arcana of the Faerie realm.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC.notes

effects.name: Ring of Feywild Sparks
effects.description: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC.notes

10.name: Ring of Flinging
10.icon: Ring C Silver A Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Flinging is an uncommon Ring that improves the throwing damage.
10.quote: Organisations like the Harpers do not relegate their activities to head-to-head combat - many a moonlit chase with an evildoer has been resolved with a loose roof tile and a decent throwing arm.

10.name: Ring of Free Action
10.icon: Ring of Free Action Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Free Action is a rare Ring that allows the wearer to ignore the effects of Difficult Terrain and gives them immunity to being Paralysed or Restrained.
10.quote: The heart of the gem seems to flow like liquid - yet it contains neither quicksilver nor mercury.

10.name: Ring of Geniality
10.icon: Ring H Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Geniality is an uncommon Ring that grants a boost to Persuasion and Deception.
10.quote: Glibness is not only in the tongue, but in the body. Gesture is powerful. Think of how many words of comfort can be stored and saved, when a hug will do just as sweetly.

10.name: Ring of Jumping
10.icon: Ring of Jumping Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Jumping is an uncommon Ring that grants the wearer the ability to cast Enhance Leap once per Short Rest.
10.quote: The ring is scuffed and twisted out of shape, as if worn by big stony fingers. The owner of those fingers has carved 'Karthol' into the warped metal in a fit of affection or possessiveness.

effects.name: Enhance Leap
effects.description: Can cast Enhance Leap as a Bonus once per Short Rest.

10.name: Ring of Mental Inhibition
10.icon: Ring B 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Mental Inhibition is an uncommon Ring that places a mentally weakening condition on enemies who fail to Save against spells and abilities.
10.quote: The patterns in the ring's swirling metal make your head spin whenever you look at them for too long.

10.name: Ring of Mind-Shielding
10.icon: Ring G Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Mind-Shielding is a rare Ring that gives advantage on saving throws against being Charmed.
10.quote: This ring is forged from a smooth, alien metal, capped with eyes of emerald that watch the world unblinking.

10.name: Ring of Poison Resistance
10.icon: Ring G 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Poison Resistance is a rare Ring that grants the wearer Resistance to Poison damage.
10.quote: The ring's emerald glows a deep, deadly green.

10.name: Ring of Protection
10.icon: Ring of Protection Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Protection is a rare Ring that grants the wearer a bonus to Armour Class and SavingThrows.
10.quote: Elegant motifs of warding - shields, targes, bucklers, and buffers - are faintly impressed into the metal round of the ring.

10.name: Ring of Regeneration
10.icon: Ring of Regeneration Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Regeneration is a very rare Ring that heals the wearer at the beginning of their turn while in combat.
10.quote: This ring is, in effect, a tiny field medic that won't charge you 70 gold pieces for a fifteen-minute consultation.

10.name: Ring of Salving
10.icon: Ring D Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Salving is an uncommon Ring that restore addtional hit points every time the wearer heals another creature.
10.quote: A hymn to Eilistraee is inscribed along the inside of this ring, which is surprisingly heavy when worn.

10.name: Ring of Self Immolation
10.icon: Ring C Silver A Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Self Immolation is an uncommon Ring that grants its wearer the ability to use the Self Immolation ability to gain the Heat condition.
10.quote: Every one of the three gems in this ring is searing hot - enough to burn yourself with the slightest brush of your fingers.

effects.name: Self Immolation
effects.description: Set yourself on fire as a Bonus to gain Heat for 2 turns (Short Rest).

10.name: Ring of Shadows
10.icon: Ring I Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Shadows is an uncommon Ring that grants its wearer the ability to cast Pass Without Trace once per Long Rest.
10.quote: For some, darkness is wielded like a black opal stud embedded in a signet ring - fashioned to a sharp and unforgiving point.

10.name: Ring of Spiteful Thunder
10.icon: Ring D Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Spiteful Thunder is a uncommon Ring that Dazes when the wearer deals Thunder damage to Reverberating creatures.
10.quote: When you slip this ring on your hand and flex your fingers, a boom of discontented thunder grumbles in the air around you.

10.name: Ring of Truthfulness
10.icon: Ring C Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Ring of Truthfulness is a rare ring that grants its wearer Advantage on Insights.
10.quote: 'Fib now, and forever hold your teeth.' - Folk saying

10.name: Ring of Twilight
10.icon: Ring I Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Ring of Twilight is a rare Ring that increases the wearer's Armour Class while obscured.
10.quote: Dark smoke swirls in the ring's oxyx, protecting something within.

10.name: Risky Ring
10.icon: Ring E Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Risky Ring is a rare Ring that grants Advantage on Attack Rolls but receive Disadvantage on SavingThrows.
10.quote: Life is just a series of risks taken while blindfolded.

10.name: Seemingly Gleaming Ring
10.icon: Ring H 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Seemingly Gleaming Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants +1 to Charisma Saving Throws and a -1 to Wisdom Saving Throws.
10.quote: The garnet at the centrepiece of this ring is like an unblinking, malevolent eye.

10.name: Shadow Blade Ring
10.icon: Ring D 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Shadow Blade Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants its wearer the ability to cast Shadow Blade. It is a reward for completing the quest Find Arabella's Parents.
10.quote: One of the relics of Deep Duerra's rebellious children. Long ago in a foreboding realm called Hammergrim, Deep Duerra, daughter of the dour god Laduguer, sired a great many heirs to her twisted corundum throne.

10.name: Shadow-Cloaked Ring
10.image: Ring B Gem B Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring B Gem B Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Shadow-Cloaked Ring is an uncommon Ring that causes the wearer's weapon and unarmed attacks to deal an additional 1d4 damage against Obscured or shadow creatures.
10.quote: Even in the brightest light, this ring never gleams, as if perpetually wrapped in shadow, hungry for the dark.

10.name: Shapeshifter's Boon Ring
10.icon: Ring B Gold A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Shapeshifter's Boon Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants the wearer +1d4 on all checks made while shapeshifted or disguised.
10.quote: 'I'm a talented shapeshifter too. I can shapeshift a thin body into a fat body. All I need is a steady supply of mince pies and mulled wine.' - Overheard in a tavern in Daggerford

10.name: Shifting Corpus Ring
10.icon: Ring A Simple Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Shifting Corpus Ring is a rare Ring that grants the ability to cast Invisibility and Blur once per Long Rest.
10.quote: A shiny, deceptively simple band, designed to look like those worn by battlefield scouts and city pickpockets alike.

10.name: Smuggler's Ring
10.icon: Ring I 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Smuggler's Ring is an uncommon Ring that grants the wearer bonuses to Stealth and Sleight of Hand.
10.quote: A subtle accessory prized by purveyors of the covert arts.

effects.name: Smuggler's Ring
effects.description:
Stealth +2
Sleight of Hand +2
Charisma Red|-1

10.name: Snowburst Ring
10.image: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Faded.png
10.icon: Ring A Gem A Gold 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Snowburst Ring is an uncommon Ring that causes the wearer to create a 4.5m / 15ft circle of ice around their target when dealing Cold|Cold damage.
10.quote: A series of names have been scratched out, one after the other, on the inside of the ring. The last word, untouched, is not a name. It simply reads: Mine.

10.name: Spurred Band
10.icon: Spurred Band Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Spurred Band is an uncommon Ring that grants the wearer Momentum while greatly injured.
10.quote: Tiny barbs prick the wearer when they're injured, as if urging flight from danger.

10.name: Strange Conduit Ring
10.icon: Ring F Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Strange Conduit Ring is a uncommon Ring that grants additional Psychic damage to the wearer's weapon while Concentrating.
10.quote: In his speculative writing on arcane displacement, the wizard Tenser notes the possibility for keenly focused minds to maintain spells, and even unlock hidden potential while doing so.

10.name: Sunwalker's Gift
10.icon: Ring H Silver A 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Sunwalker's Gift is an uncommon Ring that grants a creature darkvision.
10.quote: The ring's arcane jewel parts all but the darkest of shadows.

10.name: Szarr Family Ring
10.icon: Szarr Family Ring Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Szarr Family Ring is a story Ring that opens several doors in the Szarr Palace and Cazador's Dungeon.
10.quote: This ring carries the symbol of the Szarr family and has an inscription in some crusty old language.

10.name: Tarnished Ring
10.icon: Ring A Simple Gold Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Tarnished Ring is an uncommon Ring created by combining the Gemless Ring with the Ringless Gem. It can be sold to Traders for a bit of gold.
10.quote: A cheap ring marred by rust and a thin patina of neglect.

10.name: The Sparkswall
10.icon: The Sparkswall Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Sparkswall is an uncommon Ring that shields the wearer from Lightning.
10.quote: When the inventor Yrre met the cleric Lenore, sparks flew. Apart, they were in a rut, but together, they inspired each other to push the boundaries of innovation  and invention. This ring is just one of their many scientific triumphs.

10.name: The Whispering Promise
10.icon: Ring F 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: The Whispering Promise is an uncommon Ring that grants a bonus to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws to creatures healed by the wearer.
10.quote: A soft, soothing voice floats from this ring, reciting a prayer over and over.

10.name: Till Death Do Us Part
10.icon: Partner Ring A Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: Til Death Do Us Part is a rare Ring that grants its wearer the ability to cast Beacon of Hope.
10.quote: Love is the sweetest bird that might migrate to the charming country of your heart.

10.name: True Love's Caress
10.icon: Ring B 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: True Love's Caress is one of a matching pair of Rings that grants the wearer Warding Bond.
10.quote: The most pragmatic and courageous lover ever known was, of course, Sorcha MacTire, for whom the popular hairstyle is named, and for whom many an extremely soppy poem has been written (most of them comparing her to geography).

10.name: True Love's Embrace
10.icon: Ring B 1 Unfaded Icon.png
10.description: True Love's Embrace is one of a matching pair of Rings that lets the wearer cast Warding Bond.
10.quote: The scholar of love, Joel Firris Baldidims, writes that the next time he reads about a woman compared to a flower (or any feature of geography for that matter) he's going to start knocking on poets' doors with a sledgehammer.

11.name: Abdel's Trusted Shield
11.description: Abdel's Trusted Shield is a very rare Shield that allows the wearer to cast Protection from Missiles once per Short Rest, as well as use Shield Bash.
11.quote: Attached to this shield is a faded note. 'G, I've found the best defence against an arrow is to be the one behind the bow - but this shield also does the trick in a pinch. Yours, AA'

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Absolute's Protector
11.description: Absolute's Protector is a rare Shield that reduces damage from spells by 1 if the user bears the mark of the Absolute, grants Shield Bash, and allows the wielder to cast Fire Shield: Chill once per Long Rest.
11.quote: The Absolute's power radiates from this shield, invisible waves of energy beckoning to the Branded.

effects.name: Shield Bash:
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Absolute's Warboard
11.description: Absolute's Warboard is an uncommon Shield that improves a branded wearer's Saving Throws and allows them to cast Heroism once per Long Rest.
11.quote: Blood is smeared across the shield's face, exalting wielders who bear the Absolute's mark.

11.name: Adamantine Shield
11.description: Adamantine Shield is a rare Shield that sends enemies Reeling when they miss you with a melee attack.
11.quote: The dull shine of the adamantine promises this shield could take a thousand beatings -- and still look as good as new.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity saving throw.

11.name: Gloomstrand Shield
11.description: Gloomstrand Shield is an uncommon Shield that adds +1 to Stealth
11.quote: Supposedly fashioned around a lock of hair stolen from the head of the Prince of Gloomwrought, shields of this ilk gladly welcome the dark.

11.name: Glowing Shield
11.description: The Glowing Shield is an uncommon Shield that grants you Temporary Hit Points once per Short Rest when you take damage while greatly injured.
11.quote: Soft, loving whispers emanate from this shield. Though barely audible and spoken in some long-forgotten language, they make you feel safe.

11.name: Iron-Banded Shield +1
11.description: Iron-Banded Shield +1 is a rare Shield with an enchantment increasing its Armour Class bonus.
11.quote: This thick oak shield is reinforced with a frame of rough-hammered iron.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enchantment.

effects.name: Iron-Banded Shield +1
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enchantment.

11.name: Ironvine Shield
11.description: Ironvine Shield is an uncommon Shield that damages the attacker if the wielder is using a weapon empowered with Shillelagh.
11.quote: Each whorl and groove and worm-curled twist of this shield evokes a tangle of bog-stuck trees in rain-swollen vines.

11.name: Justiciar's Greatshield
11.description: Justiciar's Greatshield is a rare Shield that allows the wielder to cast Darkness Cloak to hide themselves, and gains advantage on Perception checks.
11.quote: It's never the shield that kills you - but hearing your frantic steel thudding uselessly against this reinforced oak in the darkness is a good sign the end is near.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, use a reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

effects.name: Darkness Cloak
effects.description: Use a bonus once per Short Rest to cast Darkness Cloak.

11.name: Ketheric's Shield
11.description: Ketheric's Shield is a rare shield that grants the action Shield Bash and improves your spellcasting-related rolls. It also gives you Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.
11.quote: In the theatre of dreams, Ketheric killed his wife every night. That wasn't how things happened... but always upon waking, he would glare into the dark, long-faced and solemn, and he would think: 'I keep you alive with my memories, beloved. I kill you with what I've become.'

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Safeguard Shield
11.description: The Safeguard Shield is an uncommon Shield that grants you Saving Throws +1
11.quote: Magic got caught in this heirloom by being exposed to too many wizard family dinners.

11.name: Sentinel Shield
11.description: Sentinel Shield is a rare Shield that provides the user +3 to Initiative rolls and advantage on Perception checks
11.quote: Clever enchantments dance between the grooves of this shield, which emanates a magic of heightened awareness.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Shield +1
11.description: A Shield +1 is a rare Shield with an enchantment increasing its Armour Class bonus.
11.quote: Though dented in many places, this shield shines like new.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enchantment.

effects.name: Shield +1
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enchantment.

11.name: Shield of Devotion
11.description: Shield of Devotion is a very rare Shield that grants a Level 1 Spell Slot, Shield Bash and allows the wielder to cast Shield of Devotion: Aid at Level 3 Spell once per Long Rest.
11.quote: Any tales about the Paladins of Velen are so ancient as to be almost certainly hearsay. Irrefutable, however, is the powerful blessing they left on this ancient shield, which inspires heart-fluttering bravery to this day.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Shield of Scorching Reprisal
11.icon: Metal Shield Flaming Fist Unfaded Icon.png
11.description: Shield of Scorching Reprisal is a rare Shield that grants Fire|Fire Resistance, allows one to Shield Bash, and also apply Blazing Retaliation.
11.quote: Local rumour claims a devil's tear gives these city militia shields their fire - much to the chagrin of the barracks blacksmith.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

effects.name: Blazing Retaliation
effects.description: Once per Short Rest, use a Bonus to huddle behind your shield to increase your 1d6|Fire damage. (On Save, target still takes half damage)

11.name: Shield of Shielding
11.description: Shield of Shielding is a rare Shield that allows the wearer to cast Shield and use Shield Bash.
11.quote: Named in the style of Extremely Unimaginative Jimmy, the geographer and interior decorator who named the 'waterfall' and the 'fireplace'.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity SavingThrow.

11.name: Shield of the Undevout
11.icon: Shield of the Undevout Unfaded Icon.png
11.description: Shield of the Undevout is a very rare Shield that applies Disadvantage on Fear Saving Throws to your foes and grants an additional level 1 spell slot. It also grants Shield Bash.
11.quote: Where once this shield would protect the rallying forces of good - now it pushes them back, crushing them against their allies until they pop.

effects.name: Shield Bash
effects.description: When a foe hits you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to knock them Prone unless they succeed a Dexterity Saving Throw.

11.name: Studded Shield +1
11.icon: Item WPN HUM Shield C 1 Unfaded Icon.png
11.description: A Studded Shield +1 is a rare Shield with an enchantment increasing its Armour Class bonus.
11.quote: Small pockets of rust are starting to eat away at a few of the studs.

effects.name: Anonymous Effect
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enhancement.

effects.name: Studded Shield +1
effects.description: No special properties, beyond the Armour Class enhancement.

11.name: Swires' Sledboard
